Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.player

Class PlayerBoard

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.SimplePlayerBoard
it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.PlayerBoard
public class PlayerBoard
extends SimplePlayerBoard
PlayerBoard is the board of the player. Contains his nickname, his warehouse, his strongbox, his owned DevelopmentCards, his owned LeaderCards and summarize of his VictoryPoints.

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayerBoard

      public PlayerBoard​(java.lang.String nickname)
      Parameters:
      nickname - is player chosen nickname which was previously verified to be unique among other players. the constructor call SimplePlayerBoard constructor, and then initialized nickname, Warehouse, Strongbox, the 3 SlotDevelopmentCards, the list of LeaderCards and the VictoryPoints.

    • getNickname

      public java.lang.String getNickname()

    • getVictoryPoints

      public VictoryPoints getVictoryPoints()

    • addLeaderCard

      public void addLeaderCard​(LeaderCard card1, LeaderCard card2)
      Parameters:
      card1 - is the first LeaderCard chosen by player at the beginning.
      card2 - is the second LeaderCard chosen by player at the beginning.

    • increaseWarehouse

      public int increaseWarehouse​(Resource resource)
      Parameters:
      resource - stands for the type of resource to increase by 1 in Warehouse.
      Returns:
      false if @param resource has to be discarded.

    • switchDepots

      public void switchDepots​(int depot1, int depot2) throws ImpossibleSwitchDepotException
      Parameters:
      depot1 - stands for position of the first Depot in Warehouse to switch.
      depot2 - stands for position of the second Depot in Warehouse to switch.
      Throws:
      ImpossibleSwitchDepotException - if the switch is not possible.

    • buyDevelopmentCard

      public void buyDevelopmentCard​(DevelopmentCard card, int slot, int choice) throws InsufficientResourceException, ImpossibleDevelopmentCardAdditionException
      Parameters:
      card - is DevelopmentCard to buy.
      slot - is player's choice about in which slot @param card will be inserted.
      choice - is player's choice about which between warehouse and strongbox has the priority to be decreased.
      Throws:
      InsufficientResourceException - if player has not enough resources to buy @param card.
      ImpossibleDevelopmentCardAdditionException - if player has not available slots where insert the card. if exists active DiscountCard @param card resourceCost could be discounted. In case player has still not enough. resources, @param card resourceCost return to original and card is not bought by player.

    • findAvailableSlot

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> findAvailableSlot​(DevelopmentCard card)
      Parameters:
      card - is DevelopmentCard to buy.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList Integer of slots where @card can be inserted. for each slot verifies if @param card has the required level and in case add to @param slots.

    • activateDevelopmentCardProductionPower

      public void activateDevelopmentCardProductionPower​(int chosenSlot, Strongbox s, int choice) throws InsufficientResourceException, NoSuchProductionPowerException
      Parameters:
      chosenSlot - is the chosen SlotDevelopmentCards to activate last card production power.
      s - is a strongbox.
      choice - is player's choice about which between warehouse and strongbox has the priority to be decreased.
      Throws:
      InsufficientResourceException - if player has not enough resources to activate all production powers together.
      NoSuchProductionPowerException - if player has chosen an empty SlotDevelopmentCards. this method remove player resources by the amount required by the chosen card and increase @param s by the amount given by card production power.

    • increaseStrongbox

      public void increaseStrongbox​(Strongbox s)
      Parameters:
      s - is a strongbox. this method increase this.strongbox by the amount contained in @param s.

    • activateBasicProduction

      public void activateBasicProduction​(Resource r1, Resource r2, int choice) throws InsufficientResourceException
      Parameters:
      r1 - is a resource to be decreased by current player resources.
      r2 - is a resource to be decreased by current player resources.
      choice - is player's choice about which between warehouse and strongbox has the priority to be decreased.
      Throws:
      InsufficientResourceException - if player has not enough resources to activate all production powers together. this method decreases resources by 1 @param r1 and 1 @param r2.

    • activateAdditionalProductionPower

      public void activateAdditionalProductionPower​(int chosenAdditionalCard, int choice) throws NoSuchProductionPowerException, InsufficientResourceException
      Parameters:
      chosenAdditionalCard - is the chosen AdditionalProductionPowerCard to be activated.
      choice - is player's choice about which between warehouse and strongbox has the priority to be decreased.
      Throws:
      InsufficientResourceException - if player has not enough resources to activate all production powers together.
      NoSuchProductionPowerException - if player has chosen a not active or not existing AdditionalProductionPower. this method remove player resources by the 1 resource required by the chosen card.

    • activateLeaderCard

      public boolean activateLeaderCard​(int chosenLeaderCard) throws InsufficientResourceException, InsufficientCardsException, AlreadyDiscardLeaderCardException, ActiveLeaderCardException
      Parameters:
      chosenLeaderCard - is player's choice about which leader card to activate.
      Throws:
      InsufficientResourceException - if player has not enough resources.
      InsufficientCardsException - if player has not enough cards.
      AlreadyDiscardLeaderCardException - if player already discard this LeaderCard previously.
      ActiveLeaderCardException - if this LeaderCard is already active.

    • discardLeaderCard

      public void discardLeaderCard​(int chosenLeaderCard) throws AlreadyDiscardLeaderCardException, ActiveLeaderCardException
      Parameters:
      chosenLeaderCard - is player's choice about which leader card to discard.
      Throws:
      AlreadyDiscardLeaderCardException - if player already discard this LeaderCard previously.
      ActiveLeaderCardException - if this LeaderCard is already active.

    • isWhiteConversionLeaderCardActive

      public boolean isWhiteConversionLeaderCardActive​(int chosenLeaderCard)
      Parameters:
      chosenLeaderCard - is the position of one player's LeaderCard.
      Returns:
      true if the chosen LeaderCard is an active WhiteConversionCard. if it isn't an active WhiteConversionCard or even not exist a LeaderCard, @return false.

    • getLeaderCard

      public LeaderCard getLeaderCard​(int chosenLeaderCard) throws AlreadyDiscardLeaderCardException
      Parameters:
      chosenLeaderCard - is the position of the chosen LeaderCard.
      Returns:
      the chosen LeaderCard.
      Throws:
      AlreadyDiscardLeaderCardException

    • haveSevenDevelopmentCards

      public boolean haveSevenDevelopmentCards()
      Returns:
      true if player has 7 DevelopmentCards, otherwise @return false.

    • sumVictoryPoints

      public int sumVictoryPoints()
      Returns:
      the sum of all victoryPoints of player.

    • sumTotalResource

      public int sumTotalResource()
      Returns:
      the total amount of resource owned by player.
